name: govcore/govcore_core
description: Shared functionality for the GovCore distribution.

suggest.drupal/contact_storage: Required for GovCore Contact Form, which provides a simple site-wide contact form.
suggest.drupal/metatag: Adds support for meta tags to basic pages.
suggest.drupal/pathauto: Automatically generates pretty URLs for content.
suggest.drupal/redirect: Allows site administrators to set up redirects.
suggest.drupal/search_api: Required for GovCore Search, which provides a simple database-backed search page.
